STATE EX REL. BEARD
v.
HARDIN. 2018-0335 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 12, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Donnell, Kennedy, Fischer, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur. O'Connor, C.J., and French and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

In Mandamus. Reported at --- Ohio St.3d ----, 2018-Ohio-1286, ---N.E.3d ----. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
